DappRegistry
register

devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Registry of dapp contracts and methods that have been authorised by Argent. Registered methods can be authorised immediately for a dapp key and a wallet while the authoirsation of unregistered methods is delayed for 24 hours.

changeOwner(address).details: Lets the owner transfer ownership of the contract to a new owner.

deregister(address,bytes4[]).details: Deregisters a list of methods for a dapp contract.

isRegistered(address,bytes4).details: Checks if a method is registered for a dapp contract.
isRegistered(address,bytes4).return: true if the method is registered.

isRegistered(address,bytes4[]).details: Checks if a list of methods are registered for a dapp contract.
isRegistered(address,bytes4[]).return: true if all the methods are registered.

register(address,bytes4[]).details: Registers a list of methods for a dapp contract.

devdoc.title: DappRegistry
